sentences.sContent: So how do you approach this potential clientele to maximize your earning at the end of the month?
sentences.sContent_eng: So how do you approach this potential clientele to maximize your earning at the end of the month?
sentences.sCn: 因此在当月末你怎样对待你的潜在的客户从而达到最大化你的收入？

phrases.pCn: 利润率；生产能力；收入额
